courseSectionInformation: No gractuate credit. 8 professional hours. Approved for S/U grading only. Prerequisite: VM 611.
description: Teaches clinical skills, practices, and procedures used in the Veterinary Teaching Hospital and the Veterinary Diagnostic Laboratory and provides hands-on experience in the methodologies used to diagnose, treat, and prevent disease in animals. No gractuate credit. 8 professional hours. Approved for S/U grading only. Prerequisite: VM 611.
label: Clinical Practice VII
